title: Notecard Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: JSON description of the card.binary.get API

apiVersion.description: Semantic version of the Notecard API

cobs.description: The size of the COBS-encoded data you are expecting to be returned (in bytes)

offset.description: Used along with length, the number of bytes to offset the binary payload from 0 when retrieving binary data from the Notecard

length.description: Used along with offset, the number of bytes to retrieve from the binary storage area of the Notecard
